aliases.finish_today:
作为AI助手，我的目标是完成今日的收尾工作。我将执行以下4项操作：
1. Update the development plan in @logs/TODO.md using the `mcp-tasks` tool, 不要修改或删除其它任务项.
2. Append a summary of the day's work to the development log at @logs/development_log.md.
3. Update the GEMINI.md project memory file to reflect the current project state.
4. Commit and push all changes to the origin/master branch of the remote repository using the commit message ser {{今日日期}}.
